授業目的: 本授業の目的は、管理会計の基礎レベルの知識と代表的な技法を英語で活用できるようにすることである。
到達目標: 意思決定および業績評価に関わる理論や利益管理・原価管理の方法論等について英語で解説することができる。
関連科目: Students should be familiar with basic financial accounting and introductory finance.
授業の概要・背景: For the aim of enabling students to lead corporate management, this course provides a rigorous introduction to cost/management accounting with attention to challenges arising in the private sector.
授業方法: The course employs lecture-discussions: class discussions explore insights from assigned readings.  Several classes are devoted to exercises.  Students are expected to participate actively in class. The 2024 class will be conducted as a "real-time online" lesson.
